definitions.definition: Located on a higher floor or level of a building.
definitions.example: They can sleep in the upstairs bedroom.

definitions.definition: Pertaining to a pitched ball that is high, and usually outside the strike zone.
definitions.example: That fastball was upstairs for a ball.

definitions.definition: Up the stairs; on a higher floor or level.
definitions.example: I hate the people who live upstairs, and I especially hate their piano.
After Joe did a hula dance on the kitchen table, his friends wondered if he didn’t have a lot going on upstairs.

definitions.definition: In heaven, especially with regard to where a deity might be found.
